alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:49PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamby. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Wylie, Tye, Buffalo Gap, Eula, Potosi, Caps, Hamby, Dyess Afb, Impact and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 277 and 303. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
